faqs.faq: What is the difference between a 'free' and 'paid' account?
faqs.answer: A free account is a free account. A paid account is a paid account. You can choose to have a free account or a paid account. If you choose to have a free account, you will not be charged for any services. If you choose to have a paid account, you will be charged for services. You can cancel your account at any time.
